raw_find: An endotracheal tube, NG tube, and right upper extremity PICC with its tip at the cavoatrial junction are unchanged. There is no change in left lower lobe opacity. raw_impr: Mild residual retrocardiac opacification remains, pneumonia vs. Atelectasis.
